destinations.title: Labuan Bajo
destinations.description: Labuan Bajo is a fishing town located at the western end of Flores. Home to Komodo Dragons and stunning beaches.

destinations.title: Danau Toba
destinations.description: Lake Toba is a large volcanic lake in North Sumatra. Experience magnificent views and Batak culture.

destinations.title: Samosir Island
destinations.description: Samosir Island sits within Lake Toba and offers traditional villages and scenic highlands.

destinations.title: Ngawi
destinations.description: Ngawi is a regency in East Java, known for its landscapes and culture.
